title: Glycine Vegetarian Capsules
body_html:
Natural Factors Glycine offers simple, targeted support for your fitness and wellness goals. Each vegetarian capsule provides 500 mg of glycine, a non-essential amino acid involved in muscle protein synthesis. Produced through fermentation, this vegan-friendly formula delivers free-form glycine in a convenient capsule format – a clean and easy way to complement your active lifestyle.
  • Source of a non-essential amino acid involved in muscle protein synthesis
  • Contains 500 mg of glycine per capsule
  • Easy-to-take vegetarian capsules
  • Vegan formula

title: Total Body Collagen, Salted Vanilla
body_html:
Not all collagen supplements are created equal! Each scoop of Total Body Collagen powder contains a unique, clinically studied, hydrolyzed collagen, featuring a specific amino acid composition. This formula helps your body optimize absorption and promote healthy collagen production, helping reduce wrinkles and fine lines and improve skin elasticity. Sourced from pasture-raised, grass-fed, hormone- and antibiotic-free cattle, Total Body Collagen is clean and certified as free of contaminants.
  • Helps reduce fine lines and wrinkles
  • Helps reduce eye wrinkles in four weeks
  • Features vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, glutamine, and biotin to help in collagen synthesis
  • Helps maintain healthy skin, hair, nails, bones, teeth, and gums
  • Helps reduce joint pain associated with osteoarthritis

title: Total Body Collagen, Chocolate
body_html:
Not all collagen supplements are created equal! Each scoop of Total Body Collagen powder contains a unique, clinically studied, hydrolyzed collagen, featuring a specific amino acid composition. This formula helps your body optimize absorption and promote healthy collagen production, helping reduce wrinkles and fine lines and improve skin elasticity. Sourced from pasture-raised, grass-fed, hormone- and antibiotic-free cattle, Total Body Collagen is clean and certified as free of contaminants.
  • Helps reduce fine lines and wrinkles

title: Magnesium Bisglycinate 400 mg Powder
body_html:
Magnesium Bisglycinate fits easily into your daily routine, helping you feel ready to take on whatever is ahead. It’s made with a gentle, well-absorbed form of magnesium that’s easy on the stomach.. Whether you prefer capsules or mixable powder, each format is designed to work with your lifestyle, not against it.
  • Helps maintain proper muscle function, including the heart muscle
  • Helps in the development of bones and teeth
  • Helps in energy metabolism and tissue formation
  • Source of an electrolyte and helps maintain normal electrolyte balance
  • Bisglycinate form is easy on the stomach
  • High-potency powder – one scoop per day for targeted support

title: Glycine Powder
body_html:
Fuel your fitness, recover with purpose.

Whether you’re training for strength, performance, or overall vitality, glycine can help you meet your goals. Natural Factors Glycine is a pure, vegan source of this non-essential amino acid, offered as an athletic support supplement to assist in building lean muscle mass when combined with regular weight or resistance training and a healthy, balanced diet.

Glycine is involved in muscle protein synthesis and helps support healthy glucose metabolism, making it ideal for anyone looking for a workout supplement that also helps support healthy blood sugar levels. Each scoop delivers 5 g of free-form glycine in a neutral-tasting powder, giving you flexible workout support that fits into an active lifestyle.

  • Supports lean muscle development with resistance training and a healthy diet
  • Provides glycine, an amino acid involved in muscle protein synthesis
  • Helps maintain healthy blood sugar and glucose metabolism
  • Non-GMO, pure L-glycine with no fillers or binding agents

title: Astaxanthin 12 mg
body_html:
Astaxanthin 12 mg is a fat-soluble carotenoid pigment best known for its high antioxidant ability. Sourced from microalgae, this non-GMO supplement harnesses the potent antioxidant power of 100% naturally sourced astaxanthin to help fight against cell damage caused by free radicals. Whether you are an athlete or someone seeking protection from environmental stressors such as UV light pollution, our convenient one-per-day softgels are designed to fit seamlessly into your daily routine.
  • 100% naturally sourced astaxanthin from microalgae
  • Contains antioxidants that help reduce cell damage caused by free radicals
  • Extra strength

title: Algae Omega-3
body_html:
If you’re looking for an ocean-friendly alternative to fish oil, Algae Omega-3 Plant-Based EPA & DHA is made for you. This product is rigorously tested for purity, is solvent-free, and comes from responsibly cultivated algae. It’s ideal for vegans, vegetarians, and anyone who wants to help support brain, heart, and eye function without compromising their environmental values.

  • Helps support brain, heart, and visual function
  • Vegan-friendly direct source of EPA and DHA

title: L-Tyrosine 5 g Powder
body_html:
Natural Factors L-Tyrosine is a free-form amino acid that helps reduce cognitive fatigue in physically stressful situations. Whether you’re enduring long hours, exposure to challenging environments, or intense physical activity, L-tyrosine supports your mental endurance, helping you stay sharp when experiencing stress.

This neutral-tasting, non-GMO vegan powder provides 5 g of pure L-tyrosine per scoop and contains no flavours, sweeteners, or fillers.

  • Helps decrease cognitive fatigue resulting from physically stressful situations
  • Free-form amino acid for optimal absorption and effectiveness
  • Non-GMO, vegan-friendly, and third-party certified for purity

title: L-Taurine Powder
body_html:
While plant-based diets may provide many health benefits, there are a few nutrients that can be tricky to get enough of while maintaining a vegan diet – like L-taurine! This amino acid is found in highest concentrations in meat and dairy, meaning the herbivores among us may not be able to rely on dietary sources alone.
  • Helps support cardiovascular function
  • Neutral-tasting, vegan powder

title: Heartburn Chewable Tablets
body_html:
Heartburn Chew is your go-to for soothing relief from heartburn and digestive discomfort. With a tasty apple-ginger flavour, it combines the natural ingredients amla, licorice root, and slippery elm to ease that burning sensation and calm your stomach. Just take one chewable tablet 20 minutes before meals or between meals as needed.

  • Helps relieve minor inflammation of the gastrointestinal tract, abdominal pain, and burning sensation in the stomach
  • Amla is traditionally used in Ayurveda as a digestive tonic to increase appetite and aid in digestion
  • Amla is traditionally used in Ayurveda to help relieve symptoms such as heartburn and indigestion associated with heartburn (Amlapitta)

title: Astaxanthin 6 mg
body_html:
Astaxanthin 6 mg is a fat-soluble carotenoid pigment best known for its high antioxidant ability. Sourced from microalgae, this non-GMO supplement harnesses the potent antioxidant power of 100% natural astaxanthin to help fight against cell damage caused by free radicals. Whether you are an athlete or someone seeking protection from environmental stressors such as UV light pollution, our convenient one-per-day softgels are designed to fit seamlessly into your daily routine.
  • 100% natural astaxanthin from microalgae
  • Contains antioxidants that help reduce cell damage caused by free radicals

title: Women’s Ultra Probiotic 55 Billion
body_html:
Intestinal health is a key player in many aspects of our overall wellness. This is why when it comes to your gut health, you deserve robust, high-quality, effective support! Try our Women’s Ultra Probiotic 55 Billion! This premium formula provides nine gastric-resistant probiotic strains tested for their viability in the stomach to ensure survivability and efficacy.
  • Source of probiotics
  • Helps support gastrointestinal health
  • One per day

title: Women’s Every Day Probiotic 25 Billion
body_html:
Probiotics aren’t just for your gut health! Our Women’s Every Day 25 Billion is formulated with probiotic strains to help support vaginal health by helping to maintain a healthy vaginal microbiome. This premium broad-spectrum probiotic provides 10 gastric-acid-resistant strains tested for their viability in the stomach to ensure survivability and efficacy. Feel confident in restoring vaginal microflora and intestinal health with Women’s Every Day!
  • Features clinically tested strains to help maintain a healthy vaginal microbiome
  • Helps support gastrointestinal health and immune function
  • Could promote favourable gut flora
  • One per day

title: Nattokinase 100 mg
body_html:
Experience the benefits of Natural Factors Nattokinase, a fibrinolytic enzyme derived from whole natto concentrate. Made with fermented non-GMO soybeans and featuring the clinically studied NSK-SD form, this supplement helps support cardiovascular health by aiding in the natural breakdown of blood clot proteins. Free of vitamin K2. Each daily vegetarian capsule provides 2000 FU of nattokinase.
  • Helps support cardiovascular health
  • Contains nattokinase, an enzyme from naturally fermented, non-GMO soybeans
  • Features NSK-SD, a patented and clinically studied form of nattokinase

title: Peaceful Zzz – Melatonin-free
body_html:
Introducing Stress-Relax® Peaceful Zzz – your new go-to solution for serene nights and calmer days. What sets Peaceful Zzz apart? It’s melatonin-free and helps reduce cortisol, a biomarker of physical stress.

This latest addition to the Stress-Relax line features Maizinol®. Derived from non-GMO corn leaves, Maizinol has been clinically shown to provide you with the sleep and stress support you’ve been craving. Whether you’re seeking a reprieve from sleepless nights, dealing with stress, or simply looking to enhance your overall well-being, Peaceful Zzz has you covered.

  • Helps reduce cortisol levels, a biomarker of physical stress
  • Helps support a healthy mood balance
  • Helps improve sleep quality

title: 100% Vegan Vitamin D3 & K2
body_html:
Calling all vegans and vegetarians! If your everyday diet prioritizes plants, you may be lacking dietary sources of vitamins D and K2. Whole Earth & Sea® 100% Vegan Vitamin D3 & K2 provides these essential nutrients in their biologically active and easily absorbed forms! The cholecalciferol form of vitamin D3, sustainably sourced from 100% non-GMO algae, works alongside the biologically active MK-7 form of vitamin K2, naturally sourced from non-GMO natto beans, to offer dual-action support for strong bones and a healthy immune system.
  • Helps build strong bones and teeth
  • Supports immune function
  • Helps in the absorption and use of calcium and phosphorus
  • Provides easily absorbed vegan vitamin D3 from 100% non-GMO algae
  • Contains the highly bioavailable MK-7 form of vitamin K from natto beans
  • Ideal for vegans and strict vegetarians

title: Stress-Relax Nighttime Magnesium Bisglycinate Vegetarian Capsules
body_html:
Having a hard time turning your brain (and body) off at night? Quieting those thoughts and stresses from the day can prove almost impossible some nights, but not with the help of Nighttime Magnesium Bisglycinate! This formula combines Magnesium bisglycinate with melatonin, L-theanine, and PharmaGABA® to help temporarily promote relaxation so you can quiet that pesky inner monologue and help reduce the time it takes to fall asleep.
  • Helps to temporarily promote relaxation
  • Helps increase total sleep time in people experiencing sleep restriction
  • Helps reduce the time it takes to fall asleep in people who fall asleep slowly
  • Helps reset the body’s sleep-wake cycle
  • Convenient vegetarian capsules

featured_image.alt: Stress - Relax Nighttime Magnesium Bisglycinate Vegetarian Capsules

title: GrapeSeedRich Super Strength Grape Seed Extract 400 mg
body_html:
All seeds, including grape seeds, are packed with phytonutrients, the nutrients produced by plants to help keep them (and those who ingest them) healthy. Grape seeds have high amounts of two phytonutrients in particular: polyphenols – known for their antioxidant action – and proanthocyanidins. GrapeSeedRich is a 100:1 standardized extract, meaning that 100 g of fresh, non-GMO grape seeds are used to make 1 g of extract. That’s one powerful phytonutrient punch!
  • Provides antioxidant protection for the maintenance of good health
  • Helps to relieve symptoms related to non-complicated chronic venous insufficiency (CVI), such as a sensation of swelling, heaviness and tingling of the legs

featured_image.alt: GrapeSeedRich Super Strength Grape Seed Extract 400 mg

title: Prenatal Moms Multi Vitamins & Minerals
body_html:
Moms have always trusted Big Friends® to help support their children’s health, and now we’re here for moms-to-be, too! Pregnancy is one of the most nutritionally demanding times in a woman’s life, and a high-quality prenatal vitamin can help you meet those needs. Big Friends Prenatal Moms Multi formula provides essential micronutrients to support expectant moms and their growing babies, alongside a nutrient-dense base of fresh, raw earth and sea vegetables, cruciferous sprouts, polyphenol-rich fruits, and herbs. This formula provides essential nutrients before, during, and after pregnancy!
  • Helps support normal early development of the fetal brain and spinal cord
  • Helps form red blood cells and prevent iron-deficiency anemia
  • Helps support the maintenance of eyesight, skin, membranes, and immune function
  • Helps build strong bones and teeth
  • Contains antioxidants that help protect against free radicals
  • Combines active prenatal vitamins and minerals with antioxidants, herbs, plants, and sea vegetables

title: Women’s Multi Vitamins & Minerals
body_html:
Calling all multitasking moms! You’ve always trusted Big Friends® to support your children’s nutritional needs, and now we’re here to support yours, too! We have formulated a multivitamin to help you keep up with the demands of being a mom. Our Women’s Multi Vitamins & Minerals contains a unique blend of vitamins, minerals, and added phytonutrients combined with antioxidant-rich extracts, rhodiola, digestive enzymes, cranberry concentrate, and more to help support even the busiest moms!
  • Contains optimal levels of 35+ vitamins, minerals, enzymes, antioxidants, and herbal extracts
  • Supports the development and maintenance of bones, cartilage, teeth, and gums
  • Helps maintain eyesight, skin, membranes, and immune function
  • Provides antioxidants for the maintenance of good health
  • Includes stomach-friendly iron, essential for women of childbearing age

title: Echinacea Alcohol-Free Fresh Herb Tincture for Kids
body_html:
As parents, we know that during cold and flu season, we need all the help we can get! Introducing your secret weapon in the fight against germs, Big Friends Echinacea Fresh Herb Tincture! Featuring the ECHINAMIDE® standardized extract you know and love, given to your kids at the first sign of symptoms this formula can help relieve their symptoms and shorten the duration of upper respiratory tract infections (URTIs), such as the common cold.
  • Traditionally used in herbal medicine to help relieve cold symptoms
  • Helps relieve symptoms and shorten the duration of URTIs
  • Delicious berry flavour tincture contains no alcohol
  • Made from certified organic Echinacea purpurea
  • Standardized to 1000 mg of ECHINAMIDE per 1 mL drop

featured_image.alt: Echinacea Alcohol - Free Fresh Herb Tincture for Kids

title: N-Acetyl-L-Cysteine 1000 mg
body_html:
What do N-acetyl-L-cysteine and glutathione have in common? Both are a part of the body’s antioxidant defence system! While antioxidants like glutathione have many health benefits, when taken by themselves, they can be poorly absorbed. But did you know that N-acetyl-L-cysteine (also known as NAC) facilitates the body’s production of glutathione? Give your body the antioxidant support it needs with NAC!
  • Acts as an antioxidant by protecting against free radical damage, and maintaining good health in individuals under oxidative stress
  • Protects against free radical damage
  • Helps maintain good health in individuals under oxidative stress
  • A supportive therapy in the treatment of inflammation of the respiratory system

title: Melatonin Quick Release Plus Timed Release 10 mg
body_html:
Don’t let getting a good night’s sleep stress you out. Melatonin helps reset the body’s sleep-wake cycle to effectively reset your biological clock, helping reduce the time it takes to fall asleep and increase total sleep time. It also helps prevent and reduce the effects of jet lag, including sleep disturbance and daytime fatigue. Natural Factors Melatonin comes in a sublingual tablet to ensure consistent absorption.
  • Helps reset the body’s sleep-wake cycle (an aspect of the circadian rhythm)
  • Helps increase the total sleep time in people experiencing sleep restriction or altered sleep schedules (e.g. shift work and jet lag)
  • Helps reduce the time it takes to fall asleep in people who fall asleep slowly
  • 5 mg quick release and 5 mg timed release

featured_image.alt: Melatonin Quick Release Plus Timed Release 10 mg

title: Clear Base Vitamin E 400 IU
body_html:
Vitamin E is a fat-soluble vitamin that is primarily known for its powerful antioxidant benefits. It helps protect cell membranes against damage caused by free radicals and prevents the oxidation of LDL (“bad”) cholesterol, having a positive effect on the health of the cardiovascular system.

Vitamin E is necessary for the structural and functional maintenance of cardiac, skeletal and smooth muscles. It has been shown to improve blood flow and improve symptoms in people with poor circulation to the legs. Not only does it protect against internal oxidative damage, it also guards against external factors as well, such as the harmful effects of pollution, cigarette smoke, and ultraviolet light. Vitamin E is also important for the immune system so the body can fight off invading bacteria and viruses.

Natural Factors Vitamin E is naturally sourced and is in the d-alpha tocopherol acetate form; the most potent and bioavailable in comparison to its synthetic counterpart dl-alpha. This formula is a powerful antioxidant that protects fatty acids and proteins from oxidation, protects against cell damage, and helps speed tissue healing.

  • Potent antioxidant
  • May protect against cardiovascular disease
  • Supports nerve and muscle function
  • Provides immune support

title: Vitamin C Time Release 1000 mg
body_html:
This isn’t your average vitamin C. We’ve taken C and elevated it with citrus bioflavonoids and rosehips – nature’s secret to enhanced absorption – to unlock the true power of vitamin C. Working in synergy, they optimize the body’s usage of vitamin C, provide antioxidant protection, keep collagen healthy, and help increase capillary strength.
  • Antioxidant to support the development and maintenance of bones, cartilage, teeth, and gums
  • Supports immune function
  • Promotes collagen formation, and helps wound healing and connective tissue formation

title: Niacin 500 mg
body_html:
Vitamin B3 is also known as niacin and is a member of the water-soluble B complex family of vitamins. A factor in the maintenance of good health, niacin has many uses within the body. It helps in energy metabolism and tissue formation as well as normal growth and development.

Natural Factors Vitamin B3 contains vitamin B3 in the nicotinic acid form. Available in both standard and no flush formats.

  • Helps in energy metabolism and tissue formation
  • Helps maintain the body’s ability to metabolize nutrients
  • Helps normal growth and development
  • For maintaining general health

title: Total Body Marine Collagen Plus Hyaluronic Acid, Glutamine, & Biotin Unflavoured Powder
body_html:
If you’re looking for a pescatarian-approved collagen supplement, look no further! Sourced from wild-caught and sustainably sourced whitefish, Total Body Marine Collagen™ is certified clean and contains unique and clinically studied hydrolyzed collagen and elastin peptides in the same ratio found naturally in humans, making it easily absorbed by the body. Total Body Marine Collagen powder helps in collagen formation and is formulated specifically for healthy-aging support.
  • Clinically shown to reduce the number of deep wrinkles in 4 weeks (28 days)
  • Helps in collagen formation to maintain healthy bones, cartilage, teeth, and gums
  • Helps maintain healthy hair, skin, and nails
  • Helps reduce joint pain associated with osteoarthritis

featured_image.alt: Total Body Marine Collagen Plus Hyaluronic Acid, Glutamine, & Biotin Unflavoured Powder

title: RxOmega-3 Mini-Gels 500 mg
body_html:
RxOmega-3 gives you peace of mind in an omega-3 fish oil supplementation that checks all the boxes of premium-quality fish oil:

  • Pharmaceutical grade: Provides high potencies of omega-3 fatty acids
  • Molecularly distilled: Removes impurities like mercury and PCBs
  • Enteripure® softgels: Prevents breakdown in the stomach, ensuring no fishy aftertaste
  • Quality checked: Surpasses the strictest international standards for quality

RxOmega-3 is available in a variety of formulas and potencies, including Maximum Triple Strength, with 900 mg EPA plus DHA per softgel.

  • Supports cardiovascular health, cognitive health, and brain function
  • Encourages joint flexibility
  • Supports brain and eye health
  • 45% smaller Enteripure® softgels are easier to swallow

title: Organic Super Strength Cranberry Concentrate 500 mg
body_html:
Cranberry juice is well studied for its support of urinary tract health. But because it’s so tart, it’s difficult to drink regularly. As well, cranberry juice cocktails are full of added sugar that won’t do your urinary tract health any favours.

CranRich Super Strength Cranberry Concentrate is the perfect solution. This highly concentrated cranberry extract provides the benefits of cranberry juice in the convenience of a supplement. Each capsule contains 500 mg of a 36:1 cranberry concentrate, meaning that 36 g of cranberries are used to make just 1 g of concentrate. Plus, CranRich has no added sugar.

  • Helps prevent recurrent urinary tract infections
  • Provides antioxidants for the maintenance of good health
  • 36:1 concentration of cranberry
  • Made with organic cranberries

featured_image.alt: Organic Super Strength Cranberry Concentrate 500 mg

title: Honey Blossom Zinc Lozenges
body_html:
Natural Factors Zinc Lozenges contain a unique complex of zinc, vitamin C, organic echinacea, and black elderberry to help support the immune system and help relieve cold and flu symptoms, such as sore throat.

Each lozenge provides 10 mg of zinc, an essential trace mineral with an important role in immune system function, combined with 25 mg of the antioxidant vitamin C for the maintenance of good health. Echinacea is an immune-supportive herb that is well documented in both traditional medicine and within scientific literature. ECHINAMIDE uses a patented extraction process to guarantee the bioavailability of Echinacea purpurea’s three immune-active compounds: alkylamides, cichoric acid, and polysaccharides. When taken at the first sign of infection, ECHINAMIDE may stop a cold from developing and may ease symptoms and accelerate recovery. Black elderberry provides an additional source of antioxidants and is used in herbal medicine to help relieve cold and flu symptoms, including mucous buildup, congestion, fever, and sore throat.

Zinc lozenges provide quick sublingual absorption of these nutrients that are well-tolerated by the body, making them a convenient format for anyone who has been set back with a cold or flu, or is seeking antioxidant support. They come in delicious honey blossom and cherry flavours, are naturally sweetened, and contain no artificial colours or preservatives.

  • Helps maintain immune function
  • Relieves cold and flu symptoms, such as cough, sore throat, and congestion, as used in herbal medicine
  • Helps relieve fever and promote sweating, as used in herbal medicine
  • Contains antioxidants that help protect against free radicals
  • Provides a source of zinc and vitamin C, factors in the maintenance of good health
  • Supports energy metabolism and tissue formation
